input_args.passage: "the Taliban | the Taliban, The battle took place between November 25 and December 1, 2001, in northern Afghanistan. input_args.claim: "From source, we learn that the Battle of Qala-i-Jangi took place in northern Afghanistan, following an intervention by US-led coalition forces to overturn the Taliban's Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, which was harbouring al-Qaeda operatives."
